name: Putter Panda, APT2, MSUpdater, TG-6952, APT 2, Group 36, Sulphur
description:
Heatmap of (sub)techniques for Putter Panda, APT2, MSUpdater, TG-6952, APT 2, Group 36, Sulphur. Source datasets can be found here: https://github.com/tropChaud/Categorized-Adversary-TTPs
